mapper.select: SELECT E.*,A.*,OP.*,C.*,C.CODE_NAME AS DEPT_NAME FROM TBL_EMPLOYEE E JOIN ( SELECT TO_CHAR(W.WORK_DAY, 'YYYYMM') AS OT_PAY_MONTH, W.EMP_NO, ROUND(SUM((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(W.WORK_END_TIME, 'SSSSS')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(W.WORK_START_TIME, 'SSSSS'))) / 3600 - 9), 1) AS OVERTIMEBYMONTH FROM TBL_WORK W GROUP BY TO_CHAR(W.WORK_DAY, 'YYYYMM'), W.EMP_NO ORDER BY TO_CHAR(W.WORK_DAY, 'YYYYMM'), W.EMP_NO ) A ON A.EMP_NO=E.EMP_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_OVERTIME_PAY OP ON OP.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_CODE C ON C.CODE_NO = E.DEPT_CODE WHERE OVERTIMEBYMONTH > 0 AND OT_PAY_MONTH = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM')
